name: Cube Dash (Bikram Kumar)
description:
Description

In this runner game, you are a cube. Keep going, collect all the coins and dodge the obstacles. Play 10 cool levels, with varieties of obstacles. Jump high with the gears, but be careful that you don't fall off the edge.

Controls Android:

Touch on the left part of the screen to move left, and right part to move right.

Windows/macOS/Linux:

Press A/D keys or left/right arrow keys to move .

This game is inspired from Brackeys' Cubethon Tutorial. Found bugs or have feedback?  Send to coolbikram0@gmail.com
